cause.description:
Thousands of kids from hometowns throughout Kentucky and southern Indiana have benefited from the nearly $295 million dollars Kosair Charities has given since the 1980s. Kosair Charities continues as the largest charity in the history of this region that provides for the medical care of children. All of this is possible thanks to the generous support of individuals and companies.
1. Largest supporter of Kosair Children's Hospital
2. Visit www.kosair.org to learn more
cause.mission: Since 1923 Kosair Charities has had one primary mission – helping children in need.
